pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Deploifai CLI## Installation```shellpip install deploifai```Or, install from homebrew:```shellbrew tap deploifai/deploifaibrew install deploifai```## UsageEnsure that you have installed correctly.```shell# show help messagedeploifai --help# show versiondeploifai --version```### AuthenticationFirst, generate a personal access token on your Deploifai [dashboard](https://deploif.ai/dashboard) settings.Then, login to the cli tool:```shelldeploifai auth login -u [username] -t [token]```## DocumentationSee the [documentation](https://docs.deploif.ai/cli/commands/quick-start) for more information about the CLI.
